title: Ticket #6121: Write, verify, and test instructions for ODI annex setup.
description:
The specifying draft of the instructions used Spot Fleet Instances, and contained some assumptions about the name of options and the like. Draft a new set of instructions, based on those, for using the condor_annex tool as updated for #6111 to create an annex with on-demand instances. This work specifically includes the "minor documentation fixes" from this list.

Verify the instructions after drafting them.

After verifying them, give them to ToddT and make sure he can follow them to the end without asking questions. Or, more likely, revise the instructions until he can follow them to the end without asking questions.

Once that's done, further revise them according to his feedback.

Then ask an RCF to repeat the exercise, and repeat the exercise.
